Title: Front Toward Enemy
Writer: Gerry Conway (based on the Marvel comics by), John Romita Sr. (based on the Marvel comics by), Ross Andru (based on the Marvel comics by), Steve Lightfoot (created by), Angela LaManna, Angela LaManna (story editor), Ken Kristensen (staff writer)
Actors: Jon Bernthal, Ebon Moss-Bachrach, Ben Barnes, Amber Rose Revah
Plot: Following a deadly explosion, Karen lands in a bomber's crosshairs -- and Frank isn't happy about it. Meanwhile, Curtis makes a grisly discovery.
